# Vault hooks
@requires(modules=["utils"], parameters=True)
def execution_schedules():

    gold_financing_start_date = vault.modules["utils"].get_parameter(
        vault, name=GOLD_FINANCING_START_DATE
    )
    accrue_margin_schedule = _get_accrue_margin_schedule(vault, gold_financing_start_date.date())
    repayment_day_dict = _get_initial_repayment_day_schedule(vault)

    repayment_day_schedule = {
        "day": repayment_day_dict.get("day"),
        "hour": repayment_day_dict.get("hour"),
        "minute": repayment_day_dict.get("minute"),
        "second": repayment_day_dict.get("second"),
        "month": repayment_day_dict.get("month"),
        "start_date": str(gold_financing_start_date.date()),
    }

    schedules = [
        (ACCRUE_MARGIN, accrue_margin_schedule),
        (REPAYMENT_DAY_SCHEDULE, repayment_day_schedule),
    ]

    return schedules


@requires(
    modules=["utils"],
    parameters=True,
    balances="1 year",
    last_execution_time=["REPAYMENT_DAY_SCHEDULE"],
    flags=True,
)
def derived_parameters(effective_date):
    total_outstanding_debt = _get_all_outstanding_debt(vault)
    next_repayment_date = _calculate_next_repayment_date(vault, effective_date)

    repayment_period = vault.modules["utils"].get_parameter(vault, REPAYMENT_PERIOD)
    total_term = int(vault.modules["utils"].get_parameter(vault, TOTAL_TERM))
    next_overdue_date = next_repayment_date + timedelta(days=int(repayment_period))
    sum_outstanding_dues = _sum_outstanding_dues(vault)
    outstanding_actual_principal = _get_outstanding_actual_principal(vault)
    return {
        TOTAL_OUTSTANDING_DEBT: total_outstanding_debt,
        GOLD_FINANCING_REMAINING_PRINCIPAL: outstanding_actual_principal,
        OUTSTANDING_PAYMENTS: sum_outstanding_dues,
        NEXT_REPAYMENT_DATE: next_repayment_date,
        NEXT_OVERDUE_DATE: next_overdue_date,
        REMAINING_TERM: _get_expected_remaining_term(vault, effective_date, total_term),
        EXPECTED_EMI: _get_expected_emi(vault, effective_date),
    }


@requires(modules=["utils"], parameters=True)
def post_activate_code():

    start_date = vault.modules["utils"].get_parameter(vault, name=GOLD_FINANCING_START_DATE)
    principal = Decimal(vault.modules["utils"].get_parameter(vault, name=GOLD_FINANCING_PRINCIPAL))
    disbursement_account = vault.modules["utils"].get_parameter(vault, name=DISBURSEMENT_ACCOUNT)

    denomination = vault.modules["utils"].get_parameter(vault, name=DENOMINATION)
    term = vault.modules["utils"].get_parameter(vault, name=TOTAL_TERM)
    eq_rate = Decimal(vault.modules["utils"].get_parameter(vault, name=EQUIVALENT_RATE))
    precision = int(vault.modules["utils"].get_parameter(vault, name=FULFILLMENT_PRECISION))

    monthly_instalment = vault.modules["utils"].round_decimal(
        _calculate_monthly_instalment(principal, eq_rate, term),
        precision,
    )
    margin_receivable_amount = vault.modules["utils"].round_decimal(
        (monthly_instalment * term) - principal,
        precision,
    )

    posting_ins = []
    posting_ins.extend(
        vault.make_internal_transfer_instructions(
            amount=principal,
            denomination=denomination,
            client_transaction_id=vault.get_hook_execution_id() + "_PRINCIPAL_DISBURSMENT",
            from_account_id=vault.account_id,
            from_account_address=PRINCIPAL,
            to_account_id=disbursement_account,
            to_account_address=DEFAULT_ADDRESS,
            instruction_details={
                "description": f"Disbursement of {principal} of gold financing principal",
                "event": "PRINCIPAL_DISBURSEMENT",
            },
            asset=DEFAULT_ASSET,
        )
    )

    if margin_receivable_amount > 0:
        posting_ins.extend(
            vault.make_internal_transfer_instructions(
                amount=margin_receivable_amount,
                denomination=denomination,
                client_transaction_id=vault.get_hook_execution_id() + "_MARGIN_RECEIVABLE",
                from_account_id=vault.account_id,
                from_account_address=MARGIN,
                to_account_id=vault.account_id,
                to_account_address=INTERNAL_CONTRA,
                instruction_details={
                    "description": f"Disbursement of {margin_receivable_amount} of gold financing "
                    "margin receivable",
                    "event": "MARGIN_RECEIVABLE",
                },
                asset=DEFAULT_ASSET,
            )
        )

    vault.instruct_posting_batch(
        posting_instructions=posting_ins,
        effective_date=start_date,
        client_batch_id=f"BATCH_{vault.get_hook_execution_id()}_INITIAL_GOLD_FINANCING_DISBURSMENT",
    )


@requires(
    modules=["utils"],
    event_type="ACCRUE_MARGIN",
    parameters=True,
    balances="2 months",
    last_execution_time=["REPAYMENT_DAY_SCHEDULE"],
)
@requires(
    modules=["utils"],
    event_type="REPAYMENT_DAY_SCHEDULE",
    parameters=True,
    balances="2 days live",
    last_execution_time=["REPAYMENT_DAY_SCHEDULE"],
)
def scheduled_code(event_type: str, effective_date: datetime):
    posting_instructions = []
    new_schedule = None
    if event_type == ACCRUE_MARGIN:
        posting_instructions.extend(_handle_accrue_margin(vault, effective_date))
    elif event_type == REPAYMENT_DAY_SCHEDULE:
        posting_instructions.extend(_handle_repayment_due(vault, effective_date))
        new_schedule = _get_next_repayment_day_schedule(vault, effective_date)
        vault.update_event_type(
            event_type=event_type, schedule=_create_event_type_schedule_from_dict(new_schedule)
        )
    if posting_instructions:
        _instruct_posting_batch(vault, posting_instructions, effective_date, event_type)


@requires(modules=["utils"], parameters=True, balances="latest live", flags=True)
def pre_posting_code(postings, effective_date):
    if len(postings) > 1:
        raise Rejected(
            "Multiple postings in batch not supported",
            reason_code=RejectedReason.CLIENT_CUSTOM_REASON,
        )

    denomination = vault.modules["utils"].get_parameter(vault, name=DENOMINATION)
    for posting in postings:
        if posting.denomination != denomination:
            raise Rejected(
                "Cannot make transactions in given denomination; "
                f"transactions must be in {denomination}",
                reason_code=RejectedReason.WRONG_DENOMINATION,
            )
        proposed_amount = _get_posting_amount(posting)
        if proposed_amount <= 0:
            outstanding_debt = _get_all_outstanding_debt(vault)
            if abs(proposed_amount) > outstanding_debt:
                raise Rejected(
                    "Cannot pay more than is owed",
                    reason_code=RejectedReason.AGAINST_TNC,
                )
            maximum_payment = _sum_outstanding_dues(vault)
            if abs(proposed_amount) > maximum_payment:
                raise Rejected(
                    "Overpayment transaction is not allowed",
                    reason_code=RejectedReason.AGAINST_TNC,
                )
        elif (
            postings.batch_details.get("fee") != "True"
            and postings.batch_details.get("interest_adjustment") != "True"
        ):
            raise Rejected(
                "Debiting not allowed from this account",
                reason_code=RejectedReason.AGAINST_TNC,
            )


@requires(modules=["utils"], parameters=True, balances="latest live", flags=True)
def post_posting_code(postings: PostingInstructionBatch, effective_date: datetime):
    effective_date = effective_date + timedelta(microseconds=1)
    for i, posting in enumerate(postings):
        posting_amount = _get_posting_amount(posting)
        if posting_amount == 0:
            continue
        if posting_amount < 0:
            client_transaction_id = (
                f"{posting.client_transaction_id}_{vault.get_hook_execution_id()}_{i}"
            )
            _process_payment(vault, effective_date, posting, client_transaction_id)


# Helper Functions
def _handle_accrue_margin(vault, effective_date: datetime) -> List[PostingInstruction]:
    """
    Calculate daily margin accrual posting instructions at
    the effective datetime

    :param vault: Vault object
    :param effective_date: datetime
    :return posting instructions
    """
    denomination = vault.modules["utils"].get_parameter(vault, name=DENOMINATION)

    margin_accrual_date = _get_balance_date_for_margin_accrual(vault)

    outstanding_principal = _get_outstanding_actual_principal(vault, margin_accrual_date)

    outstanding_accrue = _get_accrued_margin(vault, effective_date)

    margin_rate = vault.modules["utils"].get_parameter(vault, name=EQUIVALENT_RATE)

    margin_to_accrue = _get_daily_margin_accrual(
        vault,
        outstanding_principal,
        outstanding_accrue,
        margin_rate,
        effective_date,
    )

    posting_instructions = []

    if margin_to_accrue > 0:
        posting_instructions.extend(
            vault.make_internal_transfer_instructions(
                amount=margin_to_accrue,
                denomination=denomination,
                client_transaction_id=f"{vault.get_hook_execution_id()}_MARGIN_ACCRUAL"
                f"_CUSTOMER",
                from_account_id=vault.account_id,
                from_account_address=ACCRUED_MARGIN,
                to_account_id=vault.account_id,
                to_account_address=INTERNAL_CONTRA,
                instruction_details={
                    "description": f"Daily margin accrued at "
                    f"{(margin_rate/DAYS_IN_A_YEAR) * 100:0.6f}% on outstanding principal"
                    f" of {outstanding_principal}",
                    "event_type": ACCRUE_MARGIN,
                    "daily_margin_rate": f"{(margin_rate/DAYS_IN_A_YEAR)}",
                },
                asset=DEFAULT_ASSET,
            )
        )

    return posting_instructions


def _handle_repayment_due(vault, effective_date: datetime) -> List[PostingInstruction]:
    """
    Calculate monthly repayment installment which consist of principal due
    and margin due

    :param vault: Vault object
    :param effective_date: datetime
    :return posting instructions
    """
    margin_rate = vault.modules["utils"].get_parameter(vault, name=EQUIVALENT_RATE)

    monthly_due_amounts = _calculate_monthly_payment_margin_and_principal(vault, margin_rate, effective_date)
    posting_instructions = _get_transfer_due_instructions(
        vault=vault,
        effective_date=effective_date,
        monthly_due_amounts=monthly_due_amounts,
        event_type="CALCULATE_AND_TRANSFER_DUE_AMOUNT",
    )

    _send_repayment_notification(vault, effective_date, monthly_due_amounts)

    return posting_instructions


# Part of repayment day schedule
def _get_transfer_due_instructions(
    vault,
    effective_date: datetime,
    monthly_due_amounts: Dict[str, Decimal],
    event_type: str,
) -> List[PostingInstruction]:
    """
    Return a list of PostingInstructions to transfer
    funds based on the monthly due amounts.

    :param vault: Vault object
    :param effective_date: datetime
    :param monthly_due_amount: Dict[str, Decimal]
    :param event_type: str
    :return posting instructions
    """
    effective_date = effective_date + timedelta(microseconds=2)

    # TODO : Check overdue schedule
    # _schedule_overdue_check(vault, effective_date)

    denomination = vault.modules["utils"].get_parameter(vault, DENOMINATION)

    emi = monthly_due_amounts.get("emi", Decimal("0"))
    principal_due = monthly_due_amounts.get("principal_due", Decimal("0"))
    margin_due = monthly_due_amounts.get("margin_due", Decimal("0"))
    accrued_margin = monthly_due_amounts.get("accrued_margin", Decimal("0"))

    stored_emi = _get_effective_balance_by_address(vault, EMI_ADDRESS)

    posting_instructions = []
    if emi > 0 and emi != stored_emi:
        if stored_emi > 0:
            posting_instructions.extend(
                vault.make_internal_transfer_instructions(
                    amount=stored_emi,
                    denomination=denomination,
                    client_transaction_id=f"{vault.get_hook_execution_id()}_CLEAR_STORED_EMI",
                    from_account_id=vault.account_id,
                    from_account_address=INTERNAL_CONTRA,
                    to_account_id=vault.account_id,
                    to_account_address=EMI_ADDRESS,
                    instruction_details={
                        "description": "Clearing stored EMI amount",
                        "event": event_type,
                    },
                    asset=DEFAULT_ASSET,
                )
            )
        posting_instructions.extend(
            vault.make_internal_transfer_instructions(
                amount=emi,
                denomination=denomination,
                client_transaction_id=f"{vault.get_hook_execution_id()}_UPDATE_STORED_EMI",
                from_account_id=vault.account_id,
                from_account_address=EMI_ADDRESS,
                to_account_id=vault.account_id,
                to_account_address=INTERNAL_CONTRA,
                instruction_details={
                    "description": "Updating stored EMI amount",
                    "event": event_type,
                },
                asset=DEFAULT_ASSET,
            )
        )

    if principal_due > 0:
        posting_instructions.extend(
            vault.make_internal_transfer_instructions(
                amount=principal_due,
                denomination=denomination,
                client_transaction_id=vault.get_hook_execution_id()
                + "_PAYMENT_PERIOD_PRINCIPAL_DUE",
                from_account_id=vault.account_id,
                from_account_address=PRINCIPAL_DUE,
                to_account_id=vault.account_id,
                to_account_address=PRINCIPAL,
                instruction_details={
                    "description": f"Monthly principal added to due address: {principal_due}",
                    "event": event_type,
                },
                asset=DEFAULT_ASSET,
            )
        )

    if margin_due > 0:
        posting_instructions.extend(
            vault.make_internal_transfer_instructions(
                amount=margin_due,
                denomination=denomination,
                client_transaction_id=vault.get_hook_execution_id()
                + "_APPLY_ACCRUED_MARGIN_CUSTOMER",
                from_account_id=vault.account_id,
                from_account_address=MARGIN_DUE,
                to_account_id=vault.account_id,
                to_account_address=MARGIN,
                instruction_details={
                    "description": f"Monthly margin added to due address: {margin_due}",
                    "event": event_type,
                },
                asset=DEFAULT_ASSET,
            )
        )

        posting_instructions.extend(
            vault.make_internal_transfer_instructions(
                amount=margin_due,
                denomination=denomination,
                client_transaction_id=f"{vault.get_hook_execution_id()}_CLEAR_ACCRUED_MARGIN",
                from_account_id=vault.account_id,
                from_account_address=INTERNAL_CONTRA,
                to_account_id=vault.account_id,
                to_account_address=ACCRUED_MARGIN,
                instruction_details={
                    "description": f"Clear accrued margin of : {margin_due}",
                    "event": event_type,
                },
                asset=DEFAULT_ASSET,
            )
        )

    posting_instructions.extend(
        _create_margin_remainder_posting(
            vault,
            ACCRUED_MARGIN,
            accrued_margin,
            margin_due,
            event_type,
            denomination,
        )
    )

    return posting_instructions


def _send_repayment_notification(vault, effective_date: datetime, monthly_due: Dict[str, Decimal]):
    """
    Instruct a repayment notification.

    :param vault: Vault object
    :param effective_date: datetime, effective date of scheduled event
    :param monthly_due: Dict[str, Decimal], monthly due values
    :return: None
    """
    repayment_amount = monthly_due.get("principal_due", Decimal("0")) + monthly_due.get(
        "margin_due", Decimal("0")
    )
    repayment_period = vault.modules["utils"].get_parameter(vault, REPAYMENT_PERIOD)
    overdue_date = effective_date + timedelta(days=int(repayment_period))

    vault.instruct_notification(
        notification_type="GOLD_FINANCING_REPAYMENT",
        notification_details={
            "account_id": vault.account_id,
            "repayment_amount": str(repayment_amount),
            "overdue_date": str(overdue_date.date()),
        },
    )


def _process_payment(
    vault, effective_date: datetime, posting: PostingInstruction, client_transaction_id: str
):
    """
    Processes a payment received from the borrower, paying off the balance in different addresses
    in the correct order
    :param vault: Vault object
    :param effective_date: datetime
    :param posting: PostingInstruction
    :param client_transaction_id: str
    :return: None
    """

    denomination = vault.modules["utils"].get_parameter(vault, name=DENOMINATION)

    fulfillment_precision = int(
        vault.modules["utils"].get_parameter(vault, name=FULFILLMENT_PRECISION)
    )
    margin_income_account = vault.modules["utils"].get_parameter(
        vault, name=MARGIN_INCOME_ACCOUNT
    )

    repayment_amount_remaining = posting.balances()[
        (DEFAULT_ADDRESS, DEFAULT_ASSET, denomination, Phase.COMMITTED)
    ].net
    repayment_amount_remaining = abs(repayment_amount_remaining)

    repayment_instructions = []
    for debt_address in REPAYMENT_ORDER:
        debt_address_balance = _get_effective_balance_by_address(vault, debt_address)
        rounded_debt_address_balance = vault.modules["utils"].round_decimal(
            debt_address_balance, fulfillment_precision
        )
        if rounded_debt_address_balance and repayment_amount_remaining > 0:
            posting_amount = min(repayment_amount_remaining, rounded_debt_address_balance)
            posting_amount = vault.modules["utils"].round_decimal(
                posting_amount, fulfillment_precision
            )

            if posting_amount > 0:
                repayment_instructions.extend(
                    vault.make_internal_transfer_instructions(
                        amount=posting_amount,
                        denomination=denomination,
                        client_transaction_id=f"REPAY_{debt_address}_{client_transaction_id}",
                        from_account_id=vault.account_id,
                        from_account_address=DEFAULT_ADDRESS,
                        to_account_id=vault.account_id,
                        to_account_address=debt_address,
                        instruction_details={
                            "description": f"Paying off {posting_amount} from {debt_address}, "
                            f"which was at {rounded_debt_address_balance} - {effective_date}",
                            "event": "REPAYMENT",
                        },
                        asset=DEFAULT_ASSET,
                        override_all_restrictions=True,
                    )
                )
                if debt_address == MARGIN_DUE:
                    repayment_instructions.extend(
                        vault.make_internal_transfer_instructions(
                            amount=posting_amount,
                            denomination=denomination,
                            client_transaction_id=f"REPAYMENT_{client_transaction_id}",
                            from_account_id=vault.account_id,
                            from_account_address=INTERNAL_CONTRA,
                            to_account_id=margin_income_account,
                            to_account_address=DEFAULT_ADDRESS,
                            instruction_details={
                                "description": f"Paying off {posting_amount} from {debt_address}, "
                                f"which was at {rounded_debt_address_balance} - {effective_date}",
                                "event": "REPAYMENT",
                            },
                            asset=DEFAULT_ASSET,
                            override_all_restrictions=True,
                        )
                    )
                repayment_amount_remaining -= posting_amount

    if len(repayment_instructions) > 0:
        vault.instruct_posting_batch(
            posting_instructions=repayment_instructions, effective_date=effective_date
        )


def _get_next_repayment_day_schedule(
    vault,
    effective_date: datetime,
) -> Dict[str, str]:
    """
    Sets up dictionary for the next repayment day schedule

    :param vault: Vault object
    :param effective_date: datetime, date and time of hook being run
    :return: dict, representation of REPAYMENT_SCHEDULE schedule
    """

    repayment_schedule_date = _calculate_next_repayment_date(
        vault,
        effective_date,
    )

    return vault.modules["utils"].create_schedule_dict_from_datetime(repayment_schedule_date)


def _get_initial_repayment_day_schedule(vault) -> Dict[str, str]:
    """
    Sets up dictionary for the initial repayment day schedule

    :param vault: Vault object
    :return: dict, representation of initial REPAYMENT_SCHEDULE schedule
    """

    first_repayment_date = _calculate_first_repayment_date(vault)

    return vault.modules["utils"].create_schedule_dict_from_datetime(first_repayment_date)


# Calculate helper functions
def _calculate_monthly_instalment(
    outstanding_principal: Decimal, margin_rate: Decimal, total_term: int
) -> Decimal:
    """
    Calculate monthly installment amount at outstanding principal

    :param outstanding_principal: Decimal
    :param margin_rate: Decimal
    :param total_term: int
    :return Decimal
    """
    return (outstanding_principal * margin_rate / 12) / (
        1 - ((1 + (margin_rate / 12)) ** (-total_term))
    )


def _calculate_monthly_margin(
    vault,
    precision: int,
    outstanding_principal: Decimal,
    margin_rate: Decimal,
) -> Decimal:
    """
    Calculate monthly margin amount at outstanding principal

    :param vault: Vault object
    :param precision: int
    :param outstanding_principal: Decimal
    :param margin_rate: Decimal
    :return Decimal
    """
    return vault.modules["utils"].round_decimal(
        (outstanding_principal * margin_rate / 12), precision
    )


def _calculate_next_repayment_date(vault, effective_date: datetime) -> datetime:
    """
    Calculate next repayment schedule date at the effective date

    :param vault: Vault object
    :param effective_date: datetime
    :return datetime
    """

    gold_financing_start_date = vault.modules["utils"].get_parameter(
        vault, GOLD_FINANCING_START_DATE
    )

    last_execution_time = vault.get_last_execution_time(event_type=REPAYMENT_DAY_SCHEDULE)

    effective_date = effective_date + timedelta(hours=WIB_UTC_OFFSET)

    first_repayment_date = vault.modules["utils"].get_parameter(
        vault, FIRST_REPAYMENT_DATE, optional=True
    )
    repayment_hour = vault.modules["utils"].get_parameter(vault, REPAYMENT_HOUR)
    repayment_minute = vault.modules["utils"].get_parameter(vault, REPAYMENT_MINUTE)
    repayment_second = vault.modules["utils"].get_parameter(vault, REPAYMENT_SECOND)

    repayment_day = gold_financing_start_date.day

    if first_repayment_date:
        next_payment_date = first_repayment_date + timedelta(
            hour=repayment_hour,
            minute=repayment_minute,
            second=repayment_second,
            microsecond=0,
        )
        if next_payment_date > effective_date:
            return next_payment_date
        else:
            repayment_day = first_repayment_date.day

    earliest_event_start_date = gold_financing_start_date + timedelta(days=1)

    if last_execution_time:

        while last_execution_time <= effective_date:
            last_execution_time += timedelta(months=1)

        next_payment_date = last_execution_time + timedelta(
            day=repayment_day,
            hour=repayment_hour,
            minute=repayment_minute,
            second=repayment_second,
            microsecond=0,
        )
        return next_payment_date

    next_payment_date = effective_date + timedelta(
        day=repayment_day,
        hour=repayment_hour,
        minute=repayment_minute,
        second=repayment_second,
        microsecond=0,
    )

    if next_payment_date <= effective_date or next_payment_date <= earliest_event_start_date:
        next_payment_date += timedelta(months=1)

    return next_payment_date


def _calculate_first_repayment_date(vault) -> datetime:
    """
    Calculate first repayment schedule date at the effective date

    :param vault: Vault object
    :return datetime
    """

    repayment_hour = vault.modules["utils"].get_parameter(vault, REPAYMENT_HOUR)
    repayment_minute = vault.modules["utils"].get_parameter(vault, REPAYMENT_MINUTE)
    repayment_second = vault.modules["utils"].get_parameter(vault, REPAYMENT_SECOND)

    first_repayment_date = vault.modules["utils"].get_parameter(
        vault, name=FIRST_REPAYMENT_DATE, optional=True
    )
    if first_repayment_date is None:
        gold_financing_start_date = vault.modules["utils"].get_parameter(
            vault, GOLD_FINANCING_START_DATE
        )
        first_repayment_date = gold_financing_start_date + timedelta(months=1)

    first_repayment_date = first_repayment_date + timedelta(
        hour=repayment_hour,
        minute=repayment_minute,
        second=repayment_second,
        microsecond=0,
    )

    return first_repayment_date


def _create_margin_remainder_posting(
    vault,
    margin_address: str,
    actual_balance: Decimal,
    rounded_balance: Decimal,
    event_type: str,
    denomination: str,
    include_address_in_client_transaction_id: bool = False,
) -> List[PostingInstruction]:
    """
    Creates and returns posting instructions for handling remainder on MARGIN address due to
    any difference in accrual and fulfilment precision.
    If positive, margin was rounded down and exra margin was charged to customer.
    If negative, margin was rounded up and extra margin was returned to customer.

    :param vault: Vault object
    :param margin_address: str, margin address on which to handle remainder
    :param actual_balance: Decimal, margin balance amount prior to application
    :param rounded_balance: Decimal, rounded margin amount that was applied
    :param event_type: str, event which triggered the margin application
    :param denomination: str, denomination used for account
    :param include_address_in_client_transaction_id: bool, if True then we include the address
    when constructing the client transaction id, to ensure uniqueness.
    :return: list of posting instructions to handle margin remainder
    """
    hook_execution_id = vault.get_hook_execution_id()
    margin_remainder = actual_balance - rounded_balance
    margin_remainder_postings = []
    if include_address_in_client_transaction_id:
        client_transaction_id = (
            f"{event_type}_{margin_address}_REMAINDER_{hook_execution_id}_{denomination}"
        )
    else:
        client_transaction_id = f"{event_type}_REMAINDER_{hook_execution_id}_{denomination}"
    if margin_remainder < 0:
        margin_remainder_postings.extend(
            vault.make_internal_transfer_instructions(
                amount=abs(margin_remainder),
                denomination=denomination,
                from_account_id=vault.account_id,
                from_account_address=margin_address,
                to_account_id=vault.account_id,
                to_account_address=INTERNAL_CONTRA,
                asset=DEFAULT_ASSET,
                override_all_restrictions=True,
                client_transaction_id=f"{client_transaction_id}_CUSTOMER",
                instruction_details={
                    "description": f"Extra margin charged to customer from negative remainder"
                    f" due to repayable amount for {margin_address} rounded up",
                    "event_type": event_type,
                },
            )
        )
    elif margin_remainder > 0:
        margin_remainder_postings.extend(
            vault.make_internal_transfer_instructions(
                amount=abs(margin_remainder),
                denomination=denomination,
                from_account_id=vault.account_id,
                from_account_address=INTERNAL_CONTRA,
                to_account_id=vault.account_id,
                to_account_address=margin_address,
                asset=DEFAULT_ASSET,
                override_all_restrictions=True,
                client_transaction_id=f"{client_transaction_id}_CUSTOMER",
                instruction_details={
                    "description": f"Extra margin returned to customer from positive remainder"
                    f" due to repayable amount for {margin_address} rounded down",
                    "event_type": event_type,
                },
            )
        )

    return margin_remainder_postings


def _calculate_monthly_payment_margin_and_principal(
    vault,
    annual_margin_rate: Decimal,
    effective_date: datetime,
) -> Dict[str, Decimal]:
    """ "
    Calculate emi, accrued margin, margin due and principal due

    :param vault: Vault object
    :param annual_margin_rate: Decimal
    :param effective_date: datetime
    :return Dict[str,Decimal]
    """
    fulfillment_precision = int(
        vault.modules["utils"].get_parameter(vault, name=FULFILLMENT_PRECISION)
    )

    actual_principal = _get_outstanding_actual_principal(vault)

    principal = vault.modules["utils"].get_parameter(vault, name=GOLD_FINANCING_PRINCIPAL)
    total_term = vault.modules["utils"].get_parameter(vault, name=TOTAL_TERM)

    margin_due = _calculate_monthly_margin(
        vault, fulfillment_precision, actual_principal, annual_margin_rate
    )

    accrued_margin = _get_accrued_margin(vault)

    emi = vault.modules["utils"].round_decimal(
        _calculate_monthly_instalment(principal, annual_margin_rate, total_term),
        fulfillment_precision,
    )
    principal_due = emi - margin_due
    
    remaining_term = _get_expected_remaining_term(vault,effective_date,total_term)
    if remaining_term <= 1 :
        principal_due = actual_principal
        margin_due = _get_effective_balance_by_address(vault, MARGIN)

    return {
        "emi": emi,
        "margin_due": margin_due,
        "accrued_margin": accrued_margin,
        "principal_due": principal_due,
    }


# Posting retrieval helper functions
def _get_posting_amount(posting: PostingInstruction, include_pending_out: bool = True) -> Decimal:
    """
    Get net posting amount from posting instruction

    :param posting: PostingInstruction
    :param include_pending_out: bool
    :return Decimal
    """
    posting_amount = posting.balances()[
        (DEFAULT_ADDRESS, DEFAULT_ASSET, posting.denomination, Phase.COMMITTED)
    ].net
    if include_pending_out:
        posting_amount += posting.balances()[
            (DEFAULT_ADDRESS, DEFAULT_ASSET, posting.denomination, Phase.PENDING_OUT)
        ].net

    return Decimal(posting_amount)


# Margin helper functions
def _get_daily_margin_accrual(
    vault,
    outstanding_principal: Decimal,
    outstanding_accrue: Decimal,
    margin_rate: Decimal,
    effective_date: datetime,
) -> Decimal:

    """
    Get the amount of daily margin accrual will calculate the
    corresponding margin at the effective date

    :param outstanding_principal: Decimal
    :param outstanding_accrue: Decimal
    :param margin_rate: Decimal
    :param effective_date: datetime
    :return: Decimal
    """
    precision = int(vault.modules["utils"].get_parameter(vault, name=ACCRUAL_PRECISION))

    next_payment_date = _calculate_next_repayment_date(vault, effective_date)

    monthly_margin = vault.modules["utils"].round_decimal(
        outstanding_principal * margin_rate * Decimal(DAYS_IN_A_MONTH / DAYS_IN_A_YEAR), precision
    )
    
    total_days = (next_payment_date - effective_date).days + 1

    margin_accrual = vault.modules["utils"].round_decimal(
        (monthly_margin - outstanding_accrue) / total_days, precision
    )

    if margin_accrual < 0:
        margin_accrual = 0

    return margin_accrual


def _get_accrued_margin(vault, timestamp: datetime = None) -> Decimal:
    return vault.modules["utils"].get_balance_sum(vault, [ACCRUED_MARGIN], timestamp)


def _get_accrue_margin_schedule(
    vault, gold_financing_start_date: datetime
) -> Tuple[str, Dict[str, str]]:
    """
    Get daily margin accrual schedule dict

    :param vault: Vault object
    :param gold_financing_start_date: datetime
    :return Tuple[str, Dict[str,str]]
    """
    gold_financing_start_date_plus_day = gold_financing_start_date + timedelta(days=1)

    accrue_margin_schedule = {
        "hour": str(vault.modules["utils"].get_parameter(vault, ACCRUE_MARGIN_HOUR)),
        "minute": str(vault.modules["utils"].get_parameter(vault, ACCRUE_MARGIN_MINUTE)),
        "second": str(vault.modules["utils"].get_parameter(vault, ACCRUE_MARGIN_SECOND)),
        "start_date": str(gold_financing_start_date_plus_day),
    }

    return accrue_margin_schedule


# Time calculation and schedule helper functions
def _get_expected_remaining_term(vault, effective_date: datetime, term: int) -> int:
    """
    The remaining term according to the natural end date of the gold financing.

    :param vault
    :param effective_date : datetime
    return: int
    """
    first_repayment_date = _calculate_first_repayment_date(vault)

    if effective_date < first_repayment_date:
        remaining_term = timedelta(months=term)
    else:
        remaining_term = timedelta(first_repayment_date.date(), effective_date.date()) + timedelta(
            months=term
        )
    if effective_date + remaining_term < effective_date + timedelta(months=1):
        return 0
    else:
        # negative days should reduce term by up to 1 month
        rounded_month = -1 if remaining_term.days < 0 else 0
        return remaining_term.years * 12 + remaining_term.months + rounded_month


def _get_next_schedule_date(
    start_date: datetime, schedule_frequency: str, intended_day: int
) -> datetime:
    """
    Calculate next valid date for schedule based on required frequency and day of month.
    Falls to last valid day of month if intended day is not in calculated month
    :param start_date: datetime, from which schedule frequency is calculated from
    :param bonus_distribution_frequency: str, Defaults to monthly.
    :param intended_day: int, day of month the scheduled date should fall on
    :return: datetime, next occurrence of schedule
    """

    if start_date + timedelta(day=intended_day) > start_date:
        next_schedule_date = start_date + timedelta(day=intended_day)
    else:
        next_schedule_date = start_date + timedelta(months=1, day=intended_day)
    return next_schedule_date


def _create_event_type_schedule_from_dict(schedule_dict: dict[str, str]) -> EventTypeSchedule:
    """
    Creates a dict representing a schedule from datetime parameters as function input
    :param schedule_dict: the dictionary representing schedule details.  Recognised key-value-pairs:
    - year: str, year for schedule to run
    - month: str, month for schedule to run
    - day: str, day of month for schedule to run
    - day_of_week: str, day of week for schedule to run
    - hour: str, hour of day for schedule to run
    - minute: str, minute of hour for schedule to run
    - second: str, second of minute for schedule to run
    :return: Corresponding EventTypeSchedule
    """
    return EventTypeSchedule(
        year=schedule_dict.get("year"),
        month=schedule_dict.get("month"),
        day=schedule_dict.get("day"),
        day_of_week=schedule_dict.get("day_of_week"),
        hour=schedule_dict.get("hour"),
        minute=schedule_dict.get("minute"),
        second=schedule_dict.get("second"),
    )


def _schedule_overdue_check(vault, effective_date: datetime):
    """
    Check the overdue schedule from repayment period parameter and
    ammend the corresponding schedule

    :param vault: Vault object
    :param effective_date: datetime
    :return None
    """
    repayment_period = vault.modules["utils"].get_parameter(vault, REPAYMENT_PERIOD)
    repayment_period_end = effective_date + timedelta(days=int(repayment_period))

    overdue_hour = int(vault.modules["utils"].get_parameter(vault, CHECK_OVERDUE_HOUR))
    overdue_minute = int(vault.modules["utils"].get_parameter(vault, CHECK_OVERDUE_MINUTE))
    overdue_second = int(vault.modules["utils"].get_parameter(vault, CHECK_OVERDUE_SECOND))

    check_overdue_datetime = repayment_period_end.replace(
        hour=overdue_hour,
        minute=overdue_minute,
        second=overdue_second,
    )

    new_schedule = vault.modules["utils"].create_schedule_dict_from_datetime(check_overdue_datetime)

    vault.update_event_type(
        event_type=CHECK_OVERDUE, schedule=_create_event_type_schedule_from_dict(new_schedule)
    )


# Balance helper functions
def _get_expected_emi(vault, effective_date: datetime) -> Decimal:
    emi = _get_effective_balance_by_address(vault, EMI_ADDRESS)
    if emi == 0:
        margin_rate = vault.modules["utils"].get_parameter(vault, name=EQUIVALENT_RATE)
        amount_due = _calculate_monthly_payment_margin_and_principal(vault, margin_rate, effective_date)
        emi = amount_due.get("emi", Decimal("0")) if amount_due is not None else Decimal("0")

    return emi


def _get_all_outstanding_debt(vault, timestamp: datetime = None) -> Decimal:
    fulfillment_precision = int(
        vault.modules["utils"].get_parameter(vault, name=FULFILLMENT_PRECISION)
    )
    return vault.modules["utils"].round_decimal(
        vault.modules["utils"].get_balance_sum(
            vault,
            ALL_ADDRESSES,
            timestamp,
        ),
        fulfillment_precision,
    )


def _sum_outstanding_dues(vault, timestamp: datetime = None) -> Decimal:
    return vault.modules["utils"].get_balance_sum(vault, REPAYMENT_ORDER, timestamp)


def _get_balance_date_for_margin_accrual(vault) -> datetime:
    last_repayment_due_date = vault.get_last_execution_time(event_type=REPAYMENT_DAY_SCHEDULE)
    # If there hasn't been a repayment event, use balances from gold financing start date
    if last_repayment_due_date is None:
        last_repayment_due_date = vault.modules["utils"].get_parameter(
            vault, name=GOLD_FINANCING_START_DATE
        )

    # Effective date of the transfer postings is 2 microseconds after repayment due event
    return last_repayment_due_date + timedelta(microseconds=1)


def _get_effective_balance_by_address(vault, address: str, timestamp: datetime = None) -> Decimal:
    return vault.modules["utils"].get_balance_sum(vault, [address], timestamp)


def _get_outstanding_actual_principal(vault, timestamp: datetime = None) -> Decimal:
    return vault.modules["utils"].get_balance_sum(vault, REMAINING_PRINCIPAL, timestamp)

# yearly_to_daily_rate
VALID_DAYS_IN_YEAR = ["360", "365", "366", "actual"]
DEFAULT_DAYS_IN_YEAR = "actual"

# misc
ROUNDING_TYPES = Union[
    ROUND_CEILING,
    ROUND_DOWN,
    ROUND_FLOOR,
    ROUND_HALF_DOWN,
    ROUND_HALF_EVEN,
    ROUND_HALF_UP,
    ROUND_05UP,

def get_parameter(
    vault,
    name: str,
    at: datetime = None,
    is_json: bool = False,
    is_boolean: bool = False,
    union: bool = False,
    optional: bool = False,
    upper_case_dict_values: bool = False,
    upper_case_list_values: bool = False,
) -> Any:
    """
    Get the parameter value for a given parameter
    :param vault:
    :param name: name of the parameter to retrieve
    :param at: datetime, time at which to retrieve the parameter value. If not
    specified the latest value is retrieved
    :param is_json: if true json_loads is called on the retrieved parameter value
    :param is_boolean: if true str_to_bool is called on the retrieved parameter value
    :param union: if True parameter will be treated as a UnionItem
    :param optional: if true we treat the parameter as optional
    :param upper_case_dict_values: if is_json is True and we are expecting the
    parameter to take shape Dict[str:Dict[str,str]], we will convert the Dict[str,str] values to
    upper case
    :param upper_case_list_values: if is_json is True and we are expecting the
    parameter to take shape Dict[str:List[str]], we will convert the List[str] values to upper case
    then we will return the dict values in upper case, whether these values are str/list/dict
    :return:
    """
    if at:
        parameter = vault.get_parameter_timeseries(name=name).at(timestamp=at)
    else:
        parameter = vault.get_parameter_timeseries(name=name).latest()

    if optional:
        parameter = parameter.value if parameter.is_set() else None

    if union and parameter is not None:
        parameter = parameter.key

    if is_boolean and parameter is not None:
        return str_to_bool(parameter)

    if is_json and parameter is not None:
        try:
            parameter = json_loads(parameter)
        except:  # noqa: E722, B001
            raise InvalidContractParameter(
                f"Exception while JSON loading parameter {name}\nValue {parameter}"
            )

        # We convert dictionary values to upper case based on the date type shape.
        # The converted values often represent transaction references, which we always
        # want to parse in upper case.
        # The dictionary keys often represent transaction types, which we want to
        # keep in the original case.
        if upper_case_dict_values:
            parameter = {
                key: {str(i).upper(): str(j).upper() for i, j in value.items()}
                for key, value in parameter.items()
            }
        elif upper_case_list_values:
            parameter = {key: [str(i).upper() for i in value] for key, value in parameter.items()}

    return parameter


def str_to_bool(string: str) -> bool:
    """
    Convert a string true to bool True, default value of False.
    :param string:
    :return:
    """
    return str(string).lower() == "true"


def yearly_to_daily_rate(yearly_rate: Decimal, year: int, days_in_year: str = "actual") -> Decimal:
    """
    Convert yearly rate to daily rate.
    """
    days_in_year = days_in_year if days_in_year in VALID_DAYS_IN_YEAR else DEFAULT_DAYS_IN_YEAR
    if days_in_year == "actual":
        days_in_year = Decimal("366") if is_leap_year(year) else Decimal("365")
    else:
        days_in_year = Decimal(days_in_year)

    return yearly_rate / days_in_year


def is_leap_year(year: int) -> bool:
    """
    Determine if given year is a leap year (i.e. has 366 days in the year)
    """
    if year % 400 == 0:
        return True
    elif year % 100 == 0:
        return False
    elif year % 4 == 0:
        return True
    else:
        return False


def round_decimal(
    amount: Decimal,
    decimal_places: int,
    rounding: ROUNDING_TYPES = ROUND_HALF_UP,
) -> Decimal:
    """
    Round an amount to specified number of decimal places
    :param amount: Decimal, amount to round
    :param decimal_places: int, number of places to round to
    :param rounding: the type of rounding strategy to use
    :return: Decimal, rounded amount
    """
    return amount.quantize(Decimal((0, (1,), -decimal_places)), rounding=rounding)


def rounded_days_between(start_date: datetime, end_date: datetime) -> int:
    """
    Calculates the rounded up number of days between two dates, positive or negative.

    :param start_date: datetime, date from which to start counting days
    :param end_date: datetime, date until which to count
    :return: int, number of days
    """
    # timedelta is actually dateutil.relativedelta, apply to arbitrary date to get real timedelta
    delta = timedelta(end_date, start_date) + start_date - start_date
    one_day = timedelta(days=1) + start_date - start_date
    days = delta.total_seconds() / one_day.total_seconds()
    rounding = "ROUND_CEILING" if days > 0 else "ROUND_FLOOR"
    return int(Decimal(days).quantize(Decimal("1"), rounding=rounding))


def is_flag_in_list_applied(
    vault, parameter_name: str, application_timestamp: datetime = None
) -> bool:
    """
    Determine if a flag is set and active for a customer from a given list of flag names
    :param vault:
    :param parameter_name: str, name of the parameter to retrieve
    :param application_timestamp: datetime, optional time at which to check if any flags
    were applied. If not specified latest is used.
    :return: bool, True if any of the flags in the parameterised list are applied at the
    timestamp
    """
    list_of_flag_names = get_parameter(vault, name=parameter_name, is_json=True)

    return any(
        vault.get_flag_timeseries(flag=flag_name).at(timestamp=application_timestamp)
        if application_timestamp
        else vault.get_flag_timeseries(flag=flag_name).latest()
        for flag_name in list_of_flag_names
    )


def create_schedule_dict_from_datetime(schedule_datetime: datetime) -> Dict[str, str]:
    """
    Creates a dict representing a schedule from datetime as function input
    """
    return {
        "year": str(schedule_datetime.year),
        "month": str(schedule_datetime.month),
        "day": str(schedule_datetime.day),
        "hour": str(schedule_datetime.hour),
        "minute": str(schedule_datetime.minute),
        "second": str(schedule_datetime.second),
    }


def has_parameter_value_changed(
    parameter_name: str,
    old_parameters: Dict[str, str],
    updated_parameters: Dict[str, str],
) -> bool:
    """
    Determines if a parameter has changed. To be used within post-parameter change hook.

    :param parameter_name: str, name of the parameter
    :param old_parameters: dict, map of parameter name -> old parameter value
    :param updated_parameters: dict, map of parameter name -> new parameter value
    :return: bool, True if parameter value has changed, False otherwise
    """

    return (
        parameter_name in updated_parameters
        and old_parameters[parameter_name] != updated_parameters[parameter_name]
    )


def are_optional_parameters_set(vault, parameters: List[str]) -> bool:
    """
    Determines whether the list of optional parameter names are set

    :param vault:
    :param parameters: List of vault parameter names

    :return: bool, True if all parameters are set, False otherwise
    """
    return all(
        get_parameter(vault, parameter, optional=True) is not None for parameter in parameters
    )


def get_balance_sum(
    vault,
    addresses: List[str],
    timestamp: datetime = None,
    denomination: str = None,
    phase: Phase = Phase.COMMITTED,
    balances: BalanceDefaultDict = None,
) -> Decimal:
    """
    Sum balances for list of given addresses.
    :param vault: balances, parameters
    :param addresses: list of addresses
    :param timestamp: optional datetime at which balances to be summed
    :param denomination: the denomination of the balance
    :param phase: phase of the balance
    :return: sum of the balances
    """
    balances = balances or (
        vault.get_balance_timeseries().latest()
        if timestamp is None
        else vault.get_balance_timeseries().at(timestamp=timestamp)
    )

    if denomination is None:
        denomination = get_parameter(vault, "denomination")

    return Decimal(
        sum(balances[(address, DEFAULT_ASSET, denomination, phase)].net for address in addresses)
    )


def get_transaction_type(
    instruction_details: Dict[str, str],
    txn_code_to_type_map: Dict[str, str],
    default_txn_type: str,
) -> str:
    """
    Gets the transaction type from Posting instruction metadata.
    :param instruction_details: mapping containing instruction-level metadata for the Posting
    :param txn_code_to_type_map: map of transaction code to transaction type
    :param default_txn_type: transaction type to default to if code not found in the map
    :return: the transaction type of the Posting instruction
    """
    txn_code = instruction_details.get("transaction_code")
    return txn_code_to_type_map.get(txn_code, default_txn_type)


def get_previous_schedule_execution_date(
    vault, event_type: str, account_start_date: datetime = None
) -> datetime:
    """
    Gets the last execution time of an event (if it exists) else returns the start date
    of the account
    :param event_type: a string of the schedule event type
    :param account_start_date: the start date of the account
    :return: the last execution time of a schedule else the account start date
    """

    last_schedule_event_date = vault.get_last_execution_time(event_type=event_type)
    return last_schedule_event_date if last_schedule_event_date is not None else account_start_date
